Reviews.Content: impressions bad door box basement smelt stale cigerette smoke bed clean sink plug bathroom broken breakfast ok special sit told anna shout milk tea frosty look eating toast view guests comming fire exit door locked husband heard unlocked morning staff smoke smoke drift wont

Reviews.Title: “Great if you are on a budget”
Reviews.Author: maxisweden
Reviews.Content: stayed times hotel return time am london pros clean especially bathroom im picky comes cleanliness friendly helpful staff excellent location quiet restaurants wide variety cuisine minutes walk shopping centre close kensington gardens hyde park close tube stations easy reach bayswater lines district circle queensway central line means pretty london easy reach feels safe value female traveller sometimes own im travelling cheap spend money lodging spend money london price size doesnt bother hotel clean cheap im content ive read hotels price range tripadvisor gem luxury hotel else prepared pay

Reviews.Title: “thats ok for me”
Reviews.Author: luciend
Reviews.Content: hotel bed breakfast ok hotel staff polite girls stays kitchen help breakfast un polite told breakfast 1000 am 945 told couldnt fry bacon told 7 min walking bayswater tube station restaurants money exchange pharmacy etc safe sleep quality beds wouldnt recomend summer didint ar fan list received hotel ok wife didnt bad hotel hotel bed breakfast

Reviews.Title: “Would happily stay there again”
Reviews.Author: Tiltom
Reviews.Content: searched hotel night stay london found clean hotel bit renovating night stay perfect arrived 45 minutes able drop bags explore london lift quiet couldnt hear floor boards bit creaky hear people talking wasnt staff met friendly helpful definitely recommend staying location 5 minute walk bayswater underground able travel lots shops eat evening nice little explore overall lovely hotel stay weekend

Reviews.Title: “Avoid this hotel”
Reviews.Author: stephenbell0
Reviews.Content: initially excited staying hotel appeared reviews website placed front hotel size shoebox position below entrance hallway meant whenever left hotel hear footsteps amplified repeatedly awoken mornings â€¢ loud talking outside door â€¢ actually coming shutting door â€¢ slamming fire door outside noisy pipes hotel using bathrooms avoid

Reviews.Title: “Great location, clean, and helpful staff.”
Reviews.Author: Jhaynes55
Reviews.Content: twin bathroom bathroom 1 person adequate clean bigger expected advised hotel budget clean change sleep spent days location 55 princess square bayswater 1 half blocks startend kensington park buses trains minutes walk portobello road plenty pubs nearby meals decent prices

Reviews.Title: “clean but rooms to hot and to small”
Reviews.Author: mikehome
Reviews.Content: wife relatives ours australia stayed hotel 3 nights 4 days junejuly found hotel clean situated fantastic suit found staff fantastically helpfull advice downside hot price payed feel breakfast included classed paying extra

Reviews.Title: “Clean and safe hotel in an excellent location”
Reviews.Author: nightgardener
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel night earlier month shared friends pretty ceiling clean tidy booked sleep hen night didnt actually spend time didnt mind size hot arrived couldnt window fan cooled efficiently bathroom clean youd expect hotel standard youre looking nofrills clean hotel near notting hill id recommend

Reviews.Title: “Building work in progress, stay away”
Reviews.Author: Dave-k-Morgan
Reviews.Content: arrived hotel lot building maintenance ongoing aware booking front covered allocated prison cell bars window 3 beware main enterance floor covering removed unacceptably noisy double specifically double refused refund offer help alternative hotel walk streets late evening hotel looked reviews website notice hotel recomendation score lot recent reviews poor advise stay hotel look 2011

Reviews.Title: “Not very pleasant!”

Reviews.Content: hotel cheap didnt expect nasty stains carpets move bed bathroom toilet didnt flush plus staff friendly location time spend money
